title: Paul Rudd | House Censures Paul Gosar as GOP Defends Him; Lindell Interviews Trump: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans defending Rep. Paul Gosar after he was formally censured by the House for tweeting a violent video targeting Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, while Trump continues to spread election lies in an interview with Mike Lindell.

Then, Paul Rudd talks about his first television role, relying on his roommate to drive him to work and living in L.A.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
